channel.title: Shops no matter what i do i cant make them work!
channel.description:
Here is my problem i have no errors or any thing but when i click trade or talk it does nothing here are my client.java and shops.cfg i also spawned him.
client.java [code] } else if (NPCID == 521) { // randomshop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71;[/code]
shops.CFG [code]shop = 71 Modshop 2 2 4272 100 773 100[/code] i am using allstarscape serversource and in shops.cfg i put the shops at the end of the list before [ENDOFSHOPSLIST] and i already spawned shops do i have to add in npchandler????? or what please help this is the 6th time i posted this im getting mad lol.

- Allstar-Scape v1 - .. Online! Connection accepted from localhost: 4635. Client type: high memory version UserId: 10433321 damnright is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-damnright]: Loading finished. [client-1-damnright]: Loading finished. [client-1-damnright]: Loading finished.
NOTHING lol idk whats wrong all other shops work lol

item.title: Shops no matter what i do i cant make them work!
item.dc:creator: @Mighty_Penguin Mighty Penguin
item.description:
@Mighty_Penguin wrote:

Well, also you need to have a NPC in your Autospawn.cfg like:

spawn = NPC ID	XCOORD	YCOORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	NAME

And if so, maybe delete the } else if (NPCID == 521) { // randomshop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 71;

Also, please post what you compiler says!

RIGHT-CLICK SELECT ALL [ENTER] THEN PASTE HERE!

Read full topic
